message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product but $175 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $125 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $175 might be a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $155. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $155 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $140. Let's see if we can find a compromise.
I understand that $155 was still a bit too high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm counteroffering at $147. This is as low as I can go without losing money on the deal.
